column5: Just stopped in to the Gander Mtn in Twinsburg (east of Cleveland) to handle the merchandise. Bought a Calcutta 201B for $112, almost bought a Quantum Energy 20 series spinning reel for $90 but resisted the temptation, picked up a 10 bearing Gander Mtn branded reel apparently made by Pfleuger for $42 (it's that white colour body and feels very smooth), got a nice light 7'2" medium one piece Gander Mtn branded IM8 spinning rod for $42 (feels great, light in weight and decent backbone w/quick tip)  Didn't plan to buy anything but couldn't resist.  JF
What,and you never bought me anything
That's what I was thinking along with, who's gonna teach you to use them John.
Any idea if the Gander Mountain in Tonawonda would have similar deals?
Good for you John, some nice deals!
HAHAHAHAHAHA Now thats funny right there. SRY John.
You shoulda picked up some more Roostertails while you were there.
I looked at them but I think frogs 'n worms are in my future.  JF
I'll find someone who can surely help. Ya know anybody?  JF
John...  I'll give you $120 for the Calcutta...that's nearly 10% profit right in your pocket!  Think about it.
John, Just bring some beer when you come over....

I was at GM in Buffalo between Xmas and new years and didn't see the Calcutta deal but they did have the GM reels on sale. Also had Stradic MG500 and MG1000 for $129  Great deals at Dicks on Huning clothing all 50% off

Sounds like you found some good bargains. If you stop by for some Crappie fishing at the end of April, we can spend a couple of minutes dialing that new Calcutta in.  If you want to sell your silver Calcutta I will buy it from you...
So, has Mrs.JohnF found your new toys yet?
I like frogs too  Have a good holiday John....
I could show you but if you want to catch fish as well you best go with the guy quoted below.
